data.title: Local current time of Pontiac, Michigan, United States, North America
data.meta_description: Find the current and exact local time of Pontiac, Michigan, United States, North America, the sunrise and sunset time and the corresponding time zone.
data.text:
What is the time zone of Pontiac, Michigan? The answer is America/Detroit.

The current time of Pontiac, Michigan has a difference of -4 hours compared to the Greenwich Mean Time zone (GMT) at a longitude of 0 degree.

Geographical coordinates of the city (Pontiac)

Latitude: 42.63892

Longitude: -83.29105

Sun relative's information

The following informations are estimates of the appearance and disappearance of the upper edge or upper limb of the Sun circle. They are based on the sunrise and sunset of the time zone's geographical coordinates. As the land is not always regular, it's practically impossible to get the exact time of the viewer's sun vision.

Sunrise

The sun will rise at 06:39:02

Solar noon

Sun will reach his highest point at 13:37:48

Sunset

20:36:34
